q: Print Andy Coulson quits Downing Street communications role The prime minister's communications chief Andy Coulson has resigned, blaming coverage of the News of the World phone hacking scandal. Mr Andy Coulson said coverage had made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role. He faced pressure after stories about phone hacking while he was editor. Mr Andy Coulson quit as editor in 2007 saying he took ultimate responsibility for the scandal but denied knowing phone hacking was taking

I never saw even the slightest hint of that. The idea that he was lying or duped is nonsense, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld told Ms. Diane Sawyer . In his book, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld also takes aim at a man still looming large on the national political stage- Arizona John McCain , a longtime thorn in his side.

Donald Rumsfeld is starting to make Robert McNamara look good. At least Robert McNamara felt sorry at the end for all those lives and limbs lost because of his colossal misjudgments and cretinous refusal to admit mistakes. We do not have the God-given right to shape every nation in our image or as we choose, a penitent Robert McNamara said. points on the highest stage you can ever score," said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers. "It was definitely a special night," Linas Kleiza said. I will remember this night for the rest of my life. The Nuggets have been searching for a consistent third scorer behind Carmelo Anthony and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday.
